title: Darkstream: Free Trade part 2
author: VD
content_html: Finally got around to addressing this in tonight’s Darkstream. Hit 13 of Henry Hazlitt’s 23 errors on free trade, which longtime readers already know. I also slapped down a Nazi larper who suggested “national socialism” as an alternative to free trade; one of these days I’m going to have to do an analysis of the Nazi economic program to make the absurdity of it clear to those who can’t move beyond the binary world of “communism bad, ergo expansionary Teutonic supremacy good.”
content_text:
Finally got around to addressing this
in tonight’s Darkstream
. Hit 13 of Henry Hazlitt’s 23 errors on free trade, which longtime readers already know. I also slapped down a Nazi larper who suggested “national socialism” as an alternative to free trade; one of these days I’m going to have to do an analysis of the Nazi economic program to make the absurdity of it clear to those who can’t move beyond the binary world of “communism bad, ergo expansionary Teutonic supremacy good.”
